The game is fun, best experienced with a good connection at 5 MB p/s or more. Great graphics, if you can handle it on your machine. It runs worse than CS:S because of it being newer, and can't run good with a poor connection because that's not how it works. Only major downside is the people in matches telling me to leave because I'm not good.

This game is a legend. Even though I put it down now and again, I always enjoy coming back. Its simple, enjoyable, and aside from hackers blowing up ranked before a ban wave its easy to get into and fun. The maps are classics, and still revamped to modern day. The AWP registry is flaky, especially compared to the scout. That is something that hasn't worked for years but apparently not enough to concern the devs. The deranking system is poor, because I don't play as often and start over with people who should not be remotely in the same rank I usually destroy the enemy team. I still infact recommend this to new players, because it is still one of the top 3 FPS games to date.

This game used to be fun, i loved wingman and playing 2v2s, but the ranking system is too broken to be playable anymore. i enter a lobby at silver 1 and get stomped by a team of MGEs with 1500 hours, probably 7/10 games. the few times i have made it out of silver one, the progression sped up tremendously and i found myself comfortably in gold nova, but getting out of silver is impossible now. i'm uninstalling the game, and i wish i could get back every hour wasted playing it.
